name: Horse and Musket: Volume 1, Frederick the Great
name_original: Horse and Musket: Volume 1, Frederick the Great
description:
Horse and Musket: Volume 1, Frederick the Great is a strategy game developed by Boku Strategy Games. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Matrix Games.
You can play Horse and Musket: Volume 1, Frederick the Great on PC.
